BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix mocking in SyntheticSourceLicenseServiceTests (#118155) Some mock verifies where missing and `LicenseState#copyCurrentLicenseState(...)` wasn't always mocked. And because of incorrect mocking the testGoldOrPlatinumLicenseCustomCutoffDate() test had an incorrect assertion.
